basic.description: This course offers selected readings and discussions of the literature of  the Italian Renaissance including such figures as Alberti, Lorenzo deMedici, Poliziano, Machiavelli, Michelangelo, Ariosto, and Tasso.
basic.subject: ITW
basic.title: Renaissance Literature

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ITW 3100 and ITW 3101, or equivalent.
